summary.description:
An example of SAR-derived image segmentation for landslides detection.

Note: A new GRASS GIS stable version has been released: GRASS GIS 7.8, available here.

i.segment - Identifies segments (objects) from imagery data.

i.segment [-dwap] group=name[,name,...] output=name [band_suffix=name] threshold=float [radius=float] [hr=float] [method=string] [similarity=string] [minsize=integer] [memory=integer] [iterations=integer] [seeds=name] [bounds=name] [goodness=name] [--overwrite] [--help] [--verbose] [--quiet] [--ui].

||| CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'landslides'
